OOC: Actually that was Scourge's blast - but cool :)

> He starts to send L=
ord Elder the data relating to his position and location.
>
> "Sorry, I had=
 ta yell because of the sound of the energy blasts. Okay, here's the skinny=
 sir, we got three trapped Autobots. Night Light who's unconcious, my new p=
al, Tucson, who came here tryn' ta save Rodimus's life, even though that lo=
usey heap of scrap doesn't deserve it for the treachery he's committed late=
ly and yeah I am reffern' ta Rodimus Prime. ACK! Lousey no good GLITCH! Loo=
k, I'll tell ya more when I can get outa here, that's if I get outa here."
=
>
> His transmission breaks after his last word.

"Rat Trap!" He depresses =
a control upping the transmission power
slightly, "Rat Trap, come in!"

Lor=
d Elder looked over at Quickstride for a moment, his optics
thoughtful, "Ye=
s of course" he said in a somewhat distracted manner.
He looked back at the=
 display screens as the alert from Legacy also
played over his communicatio=
n channels as well . . .

"We are under attack! PREPARE"

"Blast!" Lord Eld=
er said as he oriented sensors in the direction of
the Old Maximal Base, "T=
he Maximal base is under attack!" he said. Not
that he had seen any actuall=
y firepower exchanged, but he knew how
Minions were.

He glanced back at th=
e computer screen, a pensive look on his face.
"God!' he said. "The Predaco=
ns are not taking advantage of this
distraction to attack. Perhaps they hav=
e problems of their with Rat
trap there."

"Quickstride, go get the shuttle=
 prepped for launch. We don't have the
numbers to fully attack the Dark For=
tress, but maybe we can provide
enough of a distraction so Rat Trap can esc=
ape, and maybe even rescue
this Tuscon that Rat trap spoke of."

Even as he=
 spoke, Lord Elder was working to bring the Ark's defenses
online. There ha=
d been a shield here, and he and legacy had been
working to get it in place=
 before all this happened. Now would be the
time to put it through it's tes=
ts.

Preston
